programme.title: BB King - The Life of Riley
programme.desc: The American blues singer-songwriter recounts his story of a rise to prominence in the music industry, earning him the title King of the Blues. Born into a world of oppression in the cotton plantations outside Berclair, Mississippi, he went on to assemble his own band under the guidance of Millard Lee and found widespread popularity with his Singin the Blues album in the Elvis-charged swinging zeitgeist of 1956. His talent showed no bounds, and more than half a century later he released his 42nd studio album, One Kind Favor, by which time he was well into his eighties - and showing no sign of giving up. Filmed in locations across the States, as well as the United Kingdom, and featuring contributions by a range of fellow musicians including Eric Clapton, Bono, George Benson and Mick Hucknall. Narrated by Morgan Freeman

programme.title: BB King at Glastonbury
programme.desc: The famed Mississippi blues musician and electric guitarist, whose career has spanned eight decades, performs on the Pyramid Stage on the opening day of the festival. Introduced by Mark Radcliffe

programme.title: Golf: PGA Championship
programme.desc: Action from day three of the Rolex Series DP World Tour event at Wentworth Club in Surrey. Tyrrell Hatton was the last British player to win this event when he claimed the title in 2020, adding his name to a list of homegrown champions that includes Danny Willett, Rory McIlroy, Luke Donald, and Colin Montgomerie

programme.title: Miss Marple
programme.desc: Feature-length episode of the mystery drama. The sleuthing senior citizen is urged by an old friend to visit her sister as she is convinced something is wrong. Miss Marple heads for the country to investigate and it is not long before a heated argument in a locked room ends with a gunshot that leaves a man dead. Feature-length episode of the mystery drama, starring Joan Hickson, with Jean Simmons and Joss Ackland. First broadcast in 1991

programme.title: Parkinson
programme.desc: The television presenter sits down for a conversation with his special guest, the great American musician, composer and bandleader Duke Ellington. First broadcast 24 February 1973

programme.title: The Good Life
programme.desc: Margo and Jerry sow the seeds of an idea which prompts Tom and Barbara to consider a holiday. Comedy, starring Richard Briers and Felicity Kendal

programme.title: Yes Minister

programme.title: A Timewatch Guide
programme.sub-title: The Mary Rose: A Timewatch Guide
programme.desc: Historian Dan Snow explores the discovery, excavation and raising of the ship, finding out what the latest research has revealed about the vessel and her crew. The presenter also investigates how the project helped create modern underwater archaeology, and examines the techniques, challenges and successes of the divers and archaeologists involved

programme.title: The Moment of Proof
programme.desc: A claw hammer containing the killer and victims DNA is the key to cracking a murder. Plus, a burglar who photographs himself in the act leads police straight to his door

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: A former police station in the Sheldon district of Birmingham is collared by a developer who sees an opportunity for an ambitious project. Dion Dublin meets a seasoned developer tackling a site with 24 garages in Alcester in Worcestershire, and Tommy Walsh is impressed by a terraced house in Great Yarmouth ready for some attention

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: David Harper hears the extraordinary story of how Buffalo Bill brought his famed Wild West Show to the quiet mid Wales town of Builth Wells back in 1904. Todays contest takes place at the nearby Royal Welsh Showground, where a mother and stepdaughter take on a pair of friends, with the help of experts Kate Bliss and Thomas Forrester

programme.title: Sister Boniface Mysteries
programme.desc: The sleuthing sister is horrified to discover that a corpse found in the woods has all the hallmarks of a human sacrifice. Her investigations lead to a coven of witches in Great Slaughter, a discovery that endangers the life of Mother Adrian. Lorna Watson and Carolyn Pickles star

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Briony May Williams teams up with a retired Shakespeare scholar who wants to write a new chapter in the Cumbrian countryside for her £300,000 budget. Away from the house hunting, Briony visits a young couple who made their own country escape and now have a farm with over 100 acres in a tiny Cumbrian village, where they herd sheep with their beloved sheepdogs

programme.title: The Travelling Auctioneers
programme.desc: Auctioneer James Broad and restorer JJ Chalmers head to Oxford to clear a house of rare inherited collections and sentimental items. JB stumbles upon a rare and valuable book collection and JJ restores a treasured washstand. However, one wrong blow with a hammer could damage a cherished piece beyond repair

programme.title: The Answer Run
programme.desc: Jason Manford hosts the fast-paced quiz show in which three couples face a series of 50/50 questions that hurtle down the Answer Run towards them

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Ria Lina joins Alexander Armstrong to co-host the quiz in which four pairs of contestants have to score the fewest points possible by giving the least obvious answers to questions posed to 100 people before the show. At the end of each round, the team with the most points is eliminated until the final two pairs battle for a cash prize

programme.title: BBC News at Six; Weather
programme.desc: The latest headlines

programme.title: The One Show
programme.desc: JB Gill and Clara Amfo host the live magazine show featuring a mixture of celebrity chat and stories of interest

programme.title: Paula McIntyres Hamely Kitchen
programme.desc: Paulas next leg of her American food adventure sees her taking on a big breakfast challenge. She visits Americas oldest cast-iron forge to see how skillets are made, takes an unforgettable cable car ride above the mountains in Gatlinburg and tries her first taste of moonshine at a Smoky Mountain distillery. At her cabin kitchen, Paula makes a popcorn topped pudding and Hush Puppies with a savoury relish

programme.title: Our Lives
programme.desc: Documentary following four families as they compete in a prestigious haggis contest. All hail from small butcher shops and each has ambitions of winning the World Haggis Championship, staged at the Dewar Centre in Perth. Behind the fun, the bravado, the regional one-upmanship, the toon v teuchter banter, the heirloom recipes and the secret spices, this film also reveals a wider story - one of Scottish pride in its food supply chain, the importance of the community shop and the role that such dishes can play in protecting and celebrating a nations common history

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: Knockout week comes to a head as the 10 remaining amateurs undergo the invention test, in which they have just 60 minutes to deliver an extraordinary dish. The larder is at their disposal with a plentiful supply of fresh fish, meats, vegetables, herbs and spices. Success could mean a place in the semi-finals but it will is sure to be their toughest challenge yet

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island
programme.desc: A crate containing the couples mobile phones washes ashore, revealing more than anyone bargained for. David drops a bombshell to Ini, causing shockwaves at the Couples Cove. And when night falls, a movie serves up some even bigger surprises for the honeymooners. Presented by Davina McCall

As they resort to extreme measures to crack a case, the rookie is left battling his conscience in a dangerous situation. Thriller, starring Denzel Washington, Ethan Hawke, Scott Glenn and Tom Berenger

programme.title: Live Athletics: World Championships
programme.desc: Jeanette Kwakye presents further coverage of the second session on day one of the biennial event, held this year at Japan National Stadium in Tokyo. The first medals to be awarded on the track in this session come in the womens 10,000m at 1.30, which saw a clean sweep for Ethiopia two years ago in Budapest, with Gudaf Tsegay, Letesenbet Gidey and Ejgayehu Taye first, second and third respectively. Finals also take place in the mens shot put from 1.10 and mixed 4x400m relay at 2.20, as well as heats in the mens 100m from 10.55. With analysis from Jessica Ennis-Hill and Jenny Meadows, and commentary by Steve Cram, Steve Backley, Andrew Cotter, Colin Jackson, Paula Radcliffe and Stef Reid

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Steve Brown helps a couple looking for a new home in Cornwall, and gets a crash course at a sailing school which supports people of all abilities

programme.title: Early Man
programme.desc: Young Dugs sheltered life with his Stone Age tribe is shattered by bronze-mining invaders led by greedy Lord Nooth. To win his home back, desperate Dug gambles on challenging these more sophisticated folk in a contest they love, but he only knows from rock paintings - football. Director Nick Parks animated adventure, with the voices of Eddie Redmayne, Timothy Spall, Rob Brydon, Miriam Margolyes and Johnny Vegas

David Seaman, Frankie Seaman, Dr Alex George, Dr Sara Kayat, Eddie Kadi, Slim, Chemmy Alcott and Sarah Lindsay try to come up with the least likely correct answers to a series of questions posed to members of the public

programme.title: Casualty
programme.desc: The ED staff must remain professional as they treat a divisive patient. Iain is unable to face Faith and runs away from his problems. Dylan worries when Flynn is late to work again and has clearly not been home for a few days, and Ngozi prepares to say goodbye, while Nicole grapples with her emotions in the build-up to the leaving party

programme.title: BBC Proms
programme.sub-title: Last Night of the Proms: The Finale
programme.desc: Further live coverage from the Royal Albert Hall of the climax of the classical music festival, including a brand-new, specially commissioned orchestral version of Bohemian Rhapsody, to mark the 50th anniversary of the Queen classic. Louise Alder sings a My Fair Lady medley, and trumpeter Alison Balsom performs Bernstein. And of course, all the traditional favourites return to close the season. Presented by Katie Derham, with special guests including Ted Lasso star Nick Mohammed

programme.title: Match of the Day
programme.desc: Mark Chapman presents highlights of the latest Premier League matches, including Arsenal v Nottingham Forest at Emirates Stadium and West Ham United v Tottenham Hotspur at London Stadium. Arsenal claimed an impressive 3-0 victory over Forest when they hosted them last term, and the Hammers shared the spoils in a 1-1 draw with London rivals Spurs at home in the previous campaign. Plus, Bournemouth v Brighton and Hove Albion, Crystal Palace v Sunderland, Everton v Aston Villa, Fulham v Leeds United, Newcastle United v Wolverhampton Wanderers and Brentford v Chelsea

programme.title: Mindhorn
programme.desc: Richard Thorncroft, the star of 1980s sci-fi cop show Mindhorn, sets out to make it in Hollywood, but ends up with his life and career in ruins. Years later, he gets the chance to be a real hero when the police need his help. A dangerous fugitive is on the loose, who believes Detective Mindhorn is real and will only speak to him. Comedy, starring Julian Barratt, Essie Davis and Steve Coogan

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Featuring a charming Stuart highwayman, the captain of the Titanic, famous writer Mary Shelley and a group of violent Vikings, whose members show their softer side through song

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Charles Dickens sings about his life and books, and Vlad the Impaler reveals his horrible new plan for keeping out the neighbours

programme.title: The Catch Up
programme.desc: A round-up of the days news

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May test-drive an Aston Martin DBS Convertible, a Ferrari California and a Lamborghini Gallardo Convertible through Romania, searching for the mountain highway built during the reign of the countrys former dictator Nicolae Ceausescu - allegedly the best road to drive on in the world. Actor Eric Bana is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car

programme.title: Easy A
programme.desc: Misfit teenager Olive lies about her non-existent sexual history, and soon becomes the talk of the school. While she endures the harassment of conservative classmates, she grows to love the attention and sets out to create yet more rumours - but is unprepared when things get out of hand. Teen comedy, starring Emma Stone, Penn Badgley and Amanda Bynes

programme.title: Bump
programme.desc: Madison and Oly attend a protest rampage, dragging a nervous Michael along for the ride. Olys hangover leads to a big parenting fail, while a confusing encounter between Jacinda and Santis new girlfriend distracts her away from Reemas return from London. Keeks accidently sees Santi with Jacinda as she gets her coffee, so she assumes an identity that creates some confusion. Australian drama, starring Nathalie Morris, Ava Cannon and Carlos Sanson Jr

programme.title: Bump
programme.desc: Things have never been worse between Santi and Oly, who arent talking to each other. At Pica del Sabor, Bernarditas friendliness with a customer leads to a noisy showdown. Oly is alarmed when Jacinda starts spouting Bible quotes and having nightmares about burning in Hell, and angrily assumes Bernardita is to blame. When Oly learns Santi secretly enrolled Jacinda in Catholic Scripture at school, shes furious and overlooks the inconvenient fact that it was Angie who told Jacinda about Hell. Australian drama, starring Carlos Sanson Jr, Ava Cannon and Nathalie Morris

programme.title: Thailand: The Dark Side of Paradise
programme.desc: Zara McDermott discovers the dark side of Thailands backpacker culture. In the first episode, she lands in trouble with the Thai police when she starts to uncover the scale of Thailands illegal sex industry. A visit to the Bangkok Immigration Detention Centre exposes how easy it is to get caught on the wrong side of the law

programme.title: Thailand: The Dark Side of Paradise
programme.desc: Zara McDermott meets men chasing cheap thrills in Asias sex capital, Pattaya, and also talks to a local sex worker, who reveals the harsh reality of working in the illegal sex industry. She then heads to Ko Phangan, an exotic island famed for its spirituality and beauty. For Zara, this is paradise - but Lucio, a Brit who built a burgeoning cannabis business here while the drug was decriminalised, reveals that navigating the local law isnt always easy

programme.title: Thailand: The Dark Side of Paradise
programme.desc: Zara McDermott experiences Ko Phangans famous Full Moon Party, but beneath the cheap cocktails, music and fire shows, theres danger lurking as the medical team treat a possible drink-spiking victim. She then travels to Phuket and experiences a taste of Thailands luxury lifestyle. But she also learns how dream holidays can quickly go wrong, hearing the case of a British holiday-maker who died on the island - and whose family is still searching for answers

programme.title: The Fast and the Farmer-ish
programme.desc: The grand final of the tractor-driving championship sees only two of the eight teams who lined up at the start remaining. They go head to head in three high-octane agricultural challenges, from pulling massive machinery to building castles out of hay bales, in a bid to take home the trophy and title. Hosted by Tom Pemberton

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May test-drive an Aston Martin DBS Convertible, a Ferrari California and a Lamborghini Gallardo Convertible through Romania, searching for the mountain highway built during the reign of the countrys former dictator Nicolae Ceausescu - allegedly the best road to drive on in the world. Actor Eric Bana is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car

programme.title: My Insta Scammer Friend
programme.desc: The story of pioneering internet sensation Caroline Calloway. This young American girls infamous viral scandals captivated audiences across the globe, with some of her followers left feeling duped and scammed

programme.title: Athletics: World Championships Highlights
programme.desc: Sarah Mulkerrins presents action from day one of the biennial event, held this year at Japan National Stadium in Tokyo. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Clayton realises he can imitate his classmates, and begins stealing the lives of the people of Elmore. / When unexpected couples in the world of Elmore start randomly falling in love, Gumball and Darwin have to figure out whats going on. / Gumball questions Mr Smalls eco-friendly commitment, causing him to abandon society and live in the forest.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Meet the Wattersons: Mum, Dad, Anais, Darwin and of course Gumball… the 12-year-old cat with a flair for misadventure!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Advice/The Signal/The Girlfriend/The Parasite/The Love/The Scam/The Awkwardness/The Nest/The Points
programme.desc: Mr Small feels that he hasnt inspired the children of Elmore Junior High, so Gumball and Darwin try to lift his spirits./Gumball develops a strange stutter and it makes him accidentally offend Darwin./Jamie has decided she needs a sweetheart and Darwin is the best candidate, unluckily for him./Anais has made a new friend, but Gumball and Darwin arent sure their relationship is equal./Bobert finds he is infected with a virus called love.exe. He asks Gumball and Darwin to give him a definition for the word./Gumball, Darwin and Carrie team up to convince their fellow students that the school is haunted./Gumball is walking in the same direction as Hot Dog Guy, and with each step it becomes increasingly awkward./Elmore residents are going missing, and the cause of these disappearances may be closer to home than Gumball and Darwin think./Gumball and Darwin agree to do all of Tobiass chores, in exchange for good points!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Bus/The Night/The Misunderstandings/The Roots/The Blame/The Slap
programme.desc: When Rocky suggests that the Elmore Junior High kids skip school the bus is boarded by criminals who seem to want to teach them the importance of school attendance. / Ever wondered what the people of Elmore dream about? As night falls in Elmore the Moon takes us on a tour through the various dreams - and nightmares - of the inhabitants. / Gumball is late to meet Penny at the mall, but a series of misunderstandings on the way only delay him further. / When Mom sees Darwin gazing longingly at a fish-tank she thinks their mammalian lifestyle isn’t fulfilling her adopted son and deep down he longs to connect with his fishy roots. / The Parent Teacher Association of Elmore Junior High bans video games, so the kids try and prove that games arent a bad influence. / Tobias follows every single high-five with a butt-slap so when Gumball doesn’t get one he feels insulted. He tries to get Tobias to slap his rear all day but it doesn’t work.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Detective/The Fury/The Compilation/The Disaster/The Fan/The Kids/The Joy/The Coach/The Recipe
programme.desc: Anais arrives in the bedroom to find a messy crime-scene and her Daisy doll missing. She realises Gumball and Darwin are the chief suspects. / A mysterious figure from Nicoles past shows up and challenges her to a fight, but the kids are surprised when she refuses. / A compilation of some of the funniest, most bizarre clips uploaded onto the internet by the people of Elmore. / When Rob purchases a universal remote from the Awesome Store he discovers he can control the universe. He rewinds into the past and remembers Gumball had left him in The Void. / Sarah the new kid in school is Gumball and Darwins number one slightly obsessive fan. / Whilst Gumball and Darwin make fun of Mum and Dad for being old their voices start to break. / Miss Simian has to save herself from a contagious Joy virus infecting the whole school. / The new coach at Elmore High stands up to Jamie. / The secret behind Antons immortality.

programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin help Rocky land an office job so that his dad Mr Robinson will be proud of him. / Gumball jaywalks and is pulled over by Donut Cop. / Darwin starts sneezing repeatedly and it seems he cant stop. / Its Mothers Day and Gumball and Darwin discover that Tobias and Banana Joe have both made a card for The Best Mum in the World. / Mum has forced Dad to install a password on the computer… / While performing a school play Gumball is so nervous about kissing Penny that he accidentally head-butts her and cracks open her shell.

programme.desc: Carrie accidentally injures Doug, who uses the incident as an excuse to avoid unpleasant tasks. However, Arthur guesses the truth and decides to give him a taste of his own medicine. American comedy, starring Kevin James, Leah Remini and Jerry Stiller

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray and Debra spend a romantic weekend away, but try too hard to show each other a good time. Meanwhile, Marie spies on Robert, who has been left to babysit the children

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra gets a job, filling Ray with dread at the thought of having to take responsibility for all the household chores while she is at work

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra and Ray are taken aback to realise they are much nicer to strangers than to each other, and decide to show a little more mutual consideration in future - but their resolve soon crumbles. American comedy, guest starring Kevin James as Doug Heffernan, his character in The King of Queens

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: A caller to his radio show gives Frasier the impression Niless wife Maris might be having an affair with her fencing instructor. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Bebe advises Frasier to feign illness to secure a pay rise and prove he is indispensable, but the station responds by cleaning out his cubicle and auditioning for a replacement. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and Harriet Sansom Harris

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The Crane brothers buy into a restaurant, but their conflicting views on everything leave them without a head chef on opening night - and most of the waiters also walk out. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Martin prepares to celebrate his birthday, but an argument between Niles and Frasier over a patient, as well as a city-wide power cut, ensures none of the household is in the mood for a party. Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce star

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay applies his gastronomic and business acumen to Simmer Down Cafe in Georgetown, Texas, whose owner Chris Marino wishes to attract a younger, richer clientele. Chris has asked his brother Albert to come out of retirement to help with the business, but struggles with the notion that things can function properly without his presence

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary
programme.desc: Channel 4s midday news summary

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: After a long renovation, novice hosts Tom and Terry have a trial run for their vegan BandB in Spain, while test guests are also expected at Summer and Ashleys place in Italy. A busy summer season comes to a close for Paul and Fionas villa in France while, in Portugal, dreamers Louise and Shay find out if they can make it all a reality

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim Shaw and Fuzz Townshend travel to Benfleet in Essex to pick up a real 1970s supercar - a Lotus Esprit S1 - a car made famous when it transformed into a submarine in the James Bond movie The Spy Who Loved Me. When the boys arrive to collect it they discover that, rather than being one of the most eye-catching British sports cars ever constructed, they have a really tatty car that hasnt been started for 20 years

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Colin Murray and Rachel Riley host the long-running words-and-numbers game, with comedian Chris McCausland joining Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Lucy Alexander heads to the beautiful island of Ibiza hoping to help Antonia and Ross find their dream holiday home there. The couple know the island very well having holidayed there many times. Lucy lines up five impressive options, but will any of them be right for Antonia and Ross?

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc: In France, a new purchase takes Paul and Yip to a momentous milestone. Mikes restoration of his Spanish mountain village grinds to a halt. George tackles major structural issues in Sicily

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: Storms and bad weather have spelt disaster for Erin and JB, as part of the original mediaeval foundations of their island have collapsed into the moat. Trying to fix it all themselves, JBs engineering skills are put to the test when they try to raise the heavy stones. Stephanies tartan apartment project for Gerry continues as she rolls up her sleeves to sand blast the hayloft beams. Sarah and George agree to host the local town fete, but with a septic tank being installed just days before the event the grounds are far from picture perfect

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: On the Costa Blanca, married estate agents Sophie and Damon help Perthshire pair Betty and Gordon find the Alicante holiday home they have long wished for. The couple are determined not to leave Spain until the agents find them their perfect pad. On the Costa del Sol, newly engaged couple Chloe and Richard have 300,000 euros to spend on a villa that needs to accommodate them and their future family. Estate agent Kerry is challenged with fulfilling their long wish list, but things become more difficult when a potential property surprises the seasoned agent

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off: An Extra Slice

Comedy sequel, starring Jason Biggs, Chris Klein, Seann William Scott, Alyson Hannigan and Eugene Levy

programme.title: Chopper
programme.desc: Fact-based Australian drama charting the rise and fall of notorious criminal Mark Chopper Read, based on events described in his best-selling autobiographical books, some of which he wrote while serving a jail sentence for murder. Starring Eric Bana, Simon Lyndon, David Field, Daniel Wyllie and Bill Young

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay strives to turn around the fortunes of Puerto Rican restaurant El Cantito. The establishment, located in Yonkers, New York, has struggled to stay afloat post-Covid amidst the breakage of key appliances, staff problems and such unfortunate instances as uncooked chicken being served. Can Gordon turn things around?

programme.title: Educating Yorkshire
programme.desc: The pressure of secondary school starts to get real for Year 10 Casey, who is dyslexic, a condition that has left her feeling insecure, self-conscious and different. Staff discuss how AI is affecting the school more widely and how they must adapt to this ever-changing, very modern challenge, and a primary teacher is hired to help students with low literacy

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Simon White and Shirley Boyle, owners of the Old Hall Country House in Madeley, Cheshire, host the weeks first round of the BandB competition. programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Eileen Finn invites her fellow contestants to the four-star Thornley House in Allendale, Northumberland, for the second round of the contest, but struggles to follow the impressive first event. The hostesss pet cats are not to all of her guests liking, and with activities including a tour of a feline cemetery, the theme for the stay is made abundantly clear

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Jessica and Adrian Rashleigh are the third hosts, at their three-bedroom establishment Chy Conyn in St Ives, Cornwall. For the activity they arrange a magical mystery camper van tour of the local sights. Some of the guests struggle with the small breakfast room but the food is a success, and Eileen Finn demonstrates her karate skills on the men

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final stay is at the Cavendish in Bournemouth, run by Tim and Karen Sturgess. On arrival, the competitors are impressed by the pink palace, but things go downhill when a bed is broken and one couple are allocated a room next to the front door. However, Eileen is delighted by the feline memorabilia in her room and the group enjoys a spot of indoor paint-balling and an open-top bus tour of the resort

programme.title: Cheers
programme.sub-title: Where Have All the Floorboards Gone?
programme.desc: Its Norms birthday, so as a surprise, Sam arranges for Boston Celtics basketball player Kevin McHale to drop in and present him with a team jacket. However, when the star gets dragged into a pointless discussion, it obsesses him for weeks to come - and completely destroys his ability on the court. Bar-room comedy, starring Ted Danson and George Wendt

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Sam asks Carla to help him exact revenge on John Allen Hill, the irritating owner of the seafood restaurant above Cheers, but she ends up falling for him instead. Meanwhile, Cliff faces a new challenge at work _ riding a horse. Comedy, guest starring Keene Curtis, with Ted Danson and Rhea Perlman

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Woody has trouble proposing to Kelly, especially as Henri has already tricked her into saying she will marry him, claiming he is about to be deported. American bar-room comedy, starring Woody Harrelson and Jackie Swanson

programme.title: Cheers

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Robert begins taking Debra out swing dancing, but Ray feels they are becoming too close and schemes to break up their partnership. Comedy, starring Ray Romano

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Robert and Amy move into Rays basement in a bid to get some privacy, but they fail to account for Marie - who spoils their plans. Comedy, starring Ray Romano, Brad Garrett, Doris Roberts and Monica Horan

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The radio stations new manager disagrees with everything Frasier says - and when the shrink objects to her ideas, he finds his show rescheduled at two oclock in the morning. Comedy, guest starring Mercedes Ruehl, with Kelsey Grammer

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles suggests he and Frasier set up practice together - but after a series of disasters, they end up in need of therapy themselves. Comedy, guest starring Milo OShea, with Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer recalls his musical heyday as a member of the Be Sharps barbershop quartet, when he performed for President Reagan along with Principal Skinner, Barney and Apu. Featuring the voices of David Crosby and George Harrison

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The family heads to New York after Bart hears his ex-girlfriend Mary Spuckler (Zooey Deschanel) is living there. But once he arrives, the spiky-haired youngster revisits a few more of his old flames - voiced by Anne Hathaway, Sarah Michelle Gellar, Natalie Portman and Sarah Silverman - while Lisa and Marge take in the local culture

programme.title: Come Dine with Me: The Professionals
programme.desc: The first hosts in the North East, brothers Zak and Shuhel, are confident that their modern twist on traditional Indian cooking will impress their fellow professionals, at Babuls in Darlington. Their plant-based dessert is a game-changer for two vegan rivals, but their starter leaves their other guests - fellow Indian restaurateurs - feeling cold. Next up, will Alice and Alexs pizza fingers and meat-free burgers impress their rivals picky palettes, at their vegan restaurant, V-Edge, in Middlesbrough? The night ends on a high as the rival restaurateurs reveal their previous professions and share unusual impressions alongside the dessert. Finally, Shay and Syed host at their traditional family-run Indian restaurant, Sheesh Mahal, in Hartlepool. After two strong nights, will their lamb alternative wow their vegan guests?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Jasmine Harman helps Caroline and Gary from Wiltshire fulfil their long-held dream of owning a house in Spain for regular getaways to the countryside and villages of Valencia province. She shows the pair five options for their budget of £150,000 - but will they love any of them enough to put in an offer?

programme.title: George Clarkes Amazing Spaces
programme.desc: George has the idea of turning a rusty scissor lift into a cabin in the sky and starts his Denmark trip with a visit to a modern take on the old Viking longhouse. After a bus from a previous series burned in a fire, its owner replaces it with an ambitious new build made of four shipping containers. Plus, a beautician and her daughter create a four-wheeled beauty parlour

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer scour the Sussex coast for two sets of house-hunters at opposite ends of their property journey. Kirsties with retired painters and decorators Amanda and Annette, who want a spacious bungalow in a serene setting to suit their futureproofing needs. Eighteen months ago, Amanda was diagnosed with rheumatoid arthritis, making both of them realise that they wanted to seize life and move to their dream forever home. Kirstie shows them different options but by the end theres a clear winner. But can Kirstie secure it for them when its offers over their maximum budget... Meanwhile, Phil helps first-time buyers Danit and Rafi, who are after a one-bed flat close to the buzz of Brighton and Hove. Although they both agree that being close to the areas vibrant queer and Jewish communities is a top priority, Rafi wants Brighton and Danit prefers Hove. All the flats Phil offers up are in contention and it soon becomes clear that their biggest challenge is agreeing on their preferred property

programme.title: Kirstie and Phils Love It or List It
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp catches up with Kathleen and Tom to see how far they have come with the renovations to their four-bedroom Newcastle home. The couple first appeared on the show back in 2016 when their three-bedroom Victorian terrace in Gosforth, had become a four-year Love It or List It battleground. In 2019, Phil Spencer returned and learnt that the couple had made the leap to the spacious home they now reside in

programme.title: Worst House on the Street
programme.desc: Best friends Brad and Billy have bought their first home together to get on the property ladder, but all they could afford is a very dated and run-down house in Coventry. Scarlette and Stuart Douglas help them to make the most of their new home

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: Trainee crew members of the starship Enterprise embark on their maiden flight, which pits them against a Romulan commander from the future who is planning a horrific revenge on those he blames for a tragedy in his own time. Sci-fi adventure based on the original TV series, starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Eric Bana, Zoe Saldana and Leonard Nimoy

programme.title: Britains Railway Empire in Colour
programme.desc: To mark the 200th anniversary of the birth of rail, this series reveals the story of how Britain gave railways to the world - from the first tentative experiments with steam power, through the domestic boom years, to the exporting of this transformative new technology to all corners of the globe. Experts and enthusiasts and extensive newly colourised archive explore the truly revolutionary nature - both good and bad - of the locomotive. The first episode tracks how the railways grew from coal trucks in the north-east of England to transforming the lives of the Victorians. Trainspotter Francis Bourgeois tells the story of his 19th-century equivalent, schoolboy George Tod, who took stunning black and white photographs of his favourite engines. These and other photographs have been colourised, bringing the old railways back to life. There are also stories from the Empire as well as narratives from closer to home, including the magnificent Forth Bridge

programme.title: The Popes Exorcist
programme.desc: Father Gabriele Amorth, chief exorcist of the Vatican, investigates a rundown abbey in San Sebastian. The owner, Julia, claims her 12-year-old son Henry has been possessed by a demon. Local priest Father Esquibel is unprepared to tackle the profanity-spewing malevolence, so Amorth lends his years of experience to the case. Horror, starring Russell Crowe and Daniel Zovatto

programme.title: The Last Stand
programme.desc: Disgraced narcotics cop Ray Owens retires into a quiet life as sheriff of a small town on the Mexican border. He gets the chance to prove his worth as a law enforcer when a drug lord escapes from prison and tries to flee the US - with his escape route taking him through Rays jurisdiction. Action thriller, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Johnny Knoxville and Forest Whitaker

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay steps in to assess a troubled Brooklyn restaurant thats sinking into debt. As an additional problem, its co-owners are constantly clashing. Can the acerbic chef help sort out the finances and operations before it folds?

programme.title: Huge Homes with Hugh Dennis
programme.desc: The actor visits a labyrinthine home in Berkshire, which exists in the realms of fantasy - boasting a moat, a throne room and the mock ruins of a faux medieval Abbey. In Essex, he views a striking modern mansion with groundbreaking eco credentials sitting proudly on the edge of Epping Forest. Hugh gets up close and personal with its green innovations, including a climb up to its living roof. Finally in Staffordshire, Hugh calls in to a Jacobean stately pile which boasts gorgeous period charm along with all the pioneering gadgets a modern home could ever want, including a helicopter, private train and a hidden home cinema

programme.title: Extraordinary Escapes with Sandi Toksvig
programme.desc: Sandi is joined by comedian and author Rosie Jones for a journey round the Midlands exploring the best staycation retreats they have to offer. The pair begin in Rutland where they stay at the Rocket Lodge, an eco-build made of upcycled grain silos that boasts a wood-fired hot-tub, a circular kitchen and a disco bathroom. In the sand dunes on a strip of the Lincolnshire coastline, the duo stay in a rebooted 70s beach house called Sandy Feet where Sandi learns that Netflix and chill doesnt mean what she thinks it does. They end their trip close to the Welsh border on the Walcot Estate in a 200-year-old hideaway known as the Wheelwrights shop that once lived 20 miles away but was dismantled and transported piece by piece before being rebuilt to look exactly the same

programme.title: George Clarkes Amazing Spaces

programme.title: Susan Calmans Grand Day Out
programme.desc: The comedian and her campervan hit the road for a trip to Yorkshire. At York Minster, she hears about how the people of Yorkshire saved the stunning stained glass during the Second World War. Susan also visits a teddy bear museum, Bettys cafe tea rooms, and takes a miniature steam train ride

programme.title: Susan Calmans Grand Day Out
programme.desc: Susan steers her campervan around some of the beauty spots of Devon and the south coast of England, and gets the chance to dig into the footsteps of renowned fossil hunter Mary Anning, as well as fulfilling the dream of driving a vintage tram. She then discovers why South Devon is a top spot for growing chilli in the UK and handles the worlds hottest - very carefully - as she helps to plant the latest crop

programme.title: Secret Life of the Forest
programme.desc: Dalby and Cropton forests are in the midst of a heatwave and for some creatures the heat could be deadly, with bumblebees forced to stay in their nests so they do not overheat. Ecologist Cath is on a mission to discover just how many new members of the resident beaver family there are, while dedicated volunteers monitor appearances of the turtle dove, which is on the brink of extinction

programme.title: Secret Life of the Forest
programme.desc: The warm summer days continue in Dalby and Cropton Forests, and cameras capture the forests youngsters as they investigate their new surroundings, from fawns nervously exploring, to badger cubs appearing out of their setts for the first time and learning how to play-fight with their siblings. Meanwhile at the beaver pond, cameras follow herons as they lurk by the water and stalk their prey

programme.title: Portillos Andalucia
programme.desc: Michael Portillo explores the region of Andalucia in southern Spain, visiting six of his favourite locations in the area, beginning with Granada. Staying in the grounds of the Alhambra, he meets food writer Fiona Dunlop to learn about Granadas traditional cuisine, and tries his hand at the potters wheel in a 500-year-old family business

programme.title: Portillos Andalucia
programme.desc: Michael Portillo visits Malaga in time for Augusts feria, one the biggest street parties in Spain, meeting a street band most of whose members are called Portillo. He then travels 40 miles inland to the hilltop town of Ronda, stopping off at a vineyard along the way, ending his journey at a convent dating back to the 16th century, where he meets the mother superior and discovers they hold one of the Catholic churchs most important relics in the form of the hand of St Teresa

programme.title: 5 News Weekend
programme.desc: National and international news

programme.title: Great Gardens of Europe
programme.desc: A look at Trsteno Arboretum in southern Croatia, which is perched on a limestone cliff and boasts a rich history that spans more than 500 years. The programme uncovers its opulent Renaissance origins, featuring ancient stone columns, sprawling ornamental trees, sun-drenched citrus groves and intricately designed maze-like shrubs

programme.title: Glamis Castle: A Royal Retreat
programme.desc: A look at the castle in Angus, which was the childhood home of Queen Elizabeth, the Queen Mother, and playground for her daughter Elizabeth, the future queen. One of the oldest royal residences in Britain, this pink-painted fairy-tale fortress has been the family home to the Lyons, one of Britains oldest aristocratic families. Experts including Paul Burrell and Laurence Llewelyn-Bowen reveal the secrets of a house that helped shape the world views and personal convictions of Elizabeth II and her mother

programme.title: The Royal Rich List 2025: Whos Worth the Most?
programme.desc: Top finance and royal experts lift the velvet curtain on the fortunes of one of the richest families in the world, with assets, including Buckingham Palace and the Crown Jewels, estimated to come to a total worth of over £21billion. But who is the richest of them all?

programme.title: Zara and Mike: the Royal and the Rugby Player
programme.desc: Charting the story of Zara, Queen Elizabeth IIs eldest granddaughter, and rugby hero Mike Tindall, and how they cemented their places in the hearts of the British public. And asking if in this new, slimmed down royal family, should they have a frontline role?

programme.title: When TV Goes Horribly Wrong
programme.desc: Fern Britton narrates a selection of TVs most memorable guests, whether theyre suffering a slip of the tongue, a technical meltdown or having a bust-up. Featuring less-than-perfect appearances by Piers Morgan, Jonathan Ross, Stormzy, Shirley Bassey, Bez, Lembit Opik and Kathy Burke. Contributors include presenters Richard Arnold, Lucrezia Millarini, James Whale and Stephen Bailey.

programme.title: Rescue 999: Seconds to Save a Life
programme.desc: Cameras follow UK rescue teams covering sea, mountain, land and air, beginning with Killin Mountain Rescue volunteers in the Scottish Highlands. They search for a hiker stranded 3,000 feet up in the snowy peaks of Ben Oss. Plus, a marooned yacht is in peril on the Solent, and a climber has taken a serious tumble in the Lake District

programme.title: Friends

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to West Nyack, New York, to come to the aid of a family-run Mexican restaurant that is suffering a financial crisis, and a case of hard-headed patriarchy. programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Competitive couple Mike and Lisa kick off the competition in Worcester with an Italian menu inspired by their upcoming wedding in Sorrento. programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me

However, not everyone is a fan of the fine dining experience. Finally, Jo and Charlie rely on a night of Greek gastro goodies to win the £1,000 prize on offer

programme.title: Dont Tell the Bride

programme.title: Dont Tell the Bride

programme.desc: Barney tries to discover who has been warning women not to sleep with him. programme.title: How I Met Your Mother

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Afraid that shell be left alone in her old age, Beverly seeks her childrens advice on assembling a circle of friends for her later years and attempts to bond with other mothers to form their own group like The Golden Girls. programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Erica is appalled when Geoff arranges for them to go out to dinner with her family to celebrate her birthday. Geoff soon discovers that dinner with the Goldbergs is no ordinary meal out: the family repeatedly change tables, Murray insists Adam order from the childrens menu, the food is sent back to the kitchen, and Barry wants to amend his order but Beverly wont allow it. By the end of the evening, Geoff reaches breaking-point

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Adam and Murray fall out over Adams plans to pursue a comedy career after his attempts to be funny in woodwork class nearly result in his teacher getting injured. programme.title: The Goldbergs

programme.title: The Goldbergs

programme.title: Dont Tell the Bride

programme.title: Dont Tell the Bride

programme.desc: Bernadette and Howard host a dinner party, but as it falls on Sheldons Thai food night, he opts to bring his own dinner. programme.desc: Leonard and Penny continue testing their rekindled relationship using an innovative system to report discrepancies. programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Adam is thrilled when William Penn institutes a new open lunch policy, but Beverly has other plans. Geoff gets more than he bargained for when he uses Barrys student ID

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Geoff vows to rekindle Ericas interest in music, so she auditions for a college singing group. Beverly forces Adam and Murray to go camping together, hoping it will help them bond

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: When Adams birthday arrives, Beverly takes drastic measures to keep him from growing up too fast. Erica begins working at Murrays furniture store to pay off her parking tickets

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: As spring break arrives, Barry talks Erica, Ren and the JTP into an ill-advised discount vacation. Beverly struggles when Adam considers taking time off after high school

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.sub-title: The Return of the Formica King
programme.desc: Murrays business rival makes him an offer he cannot refuse, and Adam and Erica offer Ms Cinoman the chance to perform their original stage show

programme.title: Lego Masters Australia
programme.desc: The LEGO Masters teams help Hamish pitch brand-new sports to be included in the Olympic Games by building visual representations of the wacky new Olympic sports

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The chef travels to La Grange, a suburb of Chicago, to help the owners of Cafe 36, an upmarket bistro threatening to destroy the marriage of its owners due to the scale of their financial losses. The head chefs attitude to quality control is driving customers away, and it is up to Gordon Ramsay to turn the business around

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Fiery chef Gordon Ramsay comes to the aid of a mother-and-son team who have gone through 20 chefs in two years at their struggling Italian restaurant in California. The adjoining bar is a triumph, but the oldest dining establishment in town needs an overhaul if the inexperienced owners are to make a profit

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: After a sleepless night, Leonard breaks his room-mate agreement with Sheldon. Howard makes preparations to go on a flight to the International Space Station and enlists Rajs help to ensure he gets a cool astronaut nickname

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon uses his holidays to help Amy in her biology lab, but moans about the menial jobs he is given - until she asks him to dissect a brain. Penny grows curious about Leonards attitude to marriage when Bernadette asks Howard to sign a pre-nuptial agreement

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard, Raj and Howard devise a contest to decide whether Sheldon or Kripke should get Professor Rothmans vacant corner office. Meanwhile, Penny receives the gift of a painting from Amy to celebrate their friendship, but discreetly tries to dispose of it with help from Bernadette

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: A reporter discovers four humanoid amphibians who live in the sewers of New York, and use their martial arts skills to fight crime. She helps them as they face their toughest challenge yet - defeating a sinister criminal organisation that seems to have power over the entire city. Fantasy adventure, starring Megan Fox and William Fichtner, with the voice of Johnny Knoxville

programme.title: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
programme.desc: Hapless youngster Kevin somehow manages to catch the wrong plane and finds himself heading for New York, while his family jets off to Florida. Having got his hands on his fathers credit card, he is enjoying the good life staying in a luxury hotel - until he bumps into two familiar burglars with an axe to grind. Comedy sequel, starring Macaulay Culkin, Joe Pesci, Daniel Stern, Brenda Fricker and Tim Curry

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Lisa takes a trip to the mall to buy a new gadget, while Bart manages to cause chaos. After making a hasty retreat, he befriends a boy named Bashir - but Homer begins to believe that his sons new pal is involved in a terrorist plot

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Mr Burns wins a professional basketball team in a poker game at the annual billionaires retreat. He decides to build a state-of-the-art stadium in an effort to lure fans, but the proposed site is on the last remaining bee colony in Springfield - prompting Lisa to lead a protest

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart is placed on experimental medication in a bid to control his disruptive behaviour - but it proves to have unfortunate paranoia-inducing side-effects, which soon spiral out of control. Featuring the guest voice of baseball star Mark McGwire

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Guess Whos Coming to Criticise Dinner
programme.desc: Homer becomes the Springfield Shoppers new food critic, but soon makes himself unpopular with local restaurateurs, who plot to kill him with a poisonous eclair. Featuring the guest voice of Ed Asner (Up)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homers computing error plunges Earth into chaos as an electronic apocalypse threatens Springfield, and Bart and Lisa save Xena the Warrior Princess from a super-villain. Meanwhile, the Simpsons attempt to cover up their accidental murder of Ned Flanders, but he refuses to stay dead. With the guest voices of Lucy Lawless, Tom Arnold and Dick Clark

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The family relocates to an abandoned farm, where Homer discovers he has a talent for growing tomatoes - which prove highly addictive and soon attract the attention of unscrupulous rival businesses. Featuring the guest voices of the B-52s

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer bowls a perfect 300 game and becomes a local hero, giving speeches to classes of schoolchildren and appearing on TV show Springfield Squares - but it is not long before fame goes to his head. With the voices of Penn and Teller and Ron Howard

programme.title: Celebrity Gogglebox
programme.desc: Some of Britains best-known personalities appraise recent TV shows including Squid Game, Glastonbury, Open House: The Great Sex Experiment, Celebrity Bridge of Lies, Trainwreck: Poop Cruise, Millionaire Hoarders and Gary Barlows Food and Wine Tour: Australia

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on Michael McIntyres The Wheel, Love is Blind, Strictly Come Dancing, Boiling Point, HELP! My House is Haunted, All Creatures Great and Small and Sunday with Laura Kuenssberg

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on Big Brother: The Launch, Dont Look Down for SU2C, Antiques Roadshow, Coronation Street, Big Little Journeys, Beat the Chasers Celebrity Special and Sunday with Laura Kuenssberg. From October 2023

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Double-daters mum and son Andrea and Stephan enter the restaurant. Andrea is looking for a debonair, cultured and passionate man while Stephan is mainly hoping that his mum wont embarrass him. Seventy-year-old Diane refuses to let age get in the way of love and meets retired trucker and part-time crooner Neil the Wheel. Bagpipe instructor Adam is hoping that fellow Scot, Conor can bring back his excitement for dating

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: More hopeful singletons visit the First Dates restaurant looking for love. Visitors include a woman who has never had a boyfriend and has recovered from a long illness, who connects with her date over a shared love of fashion, and two strangers who bond over chocolate. Hairdresser Clints match is long-haul flight attendant Dani, who finds his jet-setting job is a hindrance to settling down

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon refuses to get his hair cut as his regular barber is in a coma - a solitary change that causes chaos in the rest of his well-ordered life. Meanwhile, Howard undergoes a gruelling Nasa training programme in Houston, Texas, meaning he can only communicate with Bernadette via the internet

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy is disappointed with Sheldon when he announces he is breaking his promise to go with her to a birthday party in favour of joining the boys for a Star Wars video-game marathon. Comedy, starring Mayim Bialik and Jim Parsons

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny buys Leonard and Sheldon some Star Trek action figures, but the duo refuse to remove them from the packaging in case their value is diminished. Elsewhere, Raj is desperate to find someone to accompany him to a wedding and asks his parents to find him a date. Featuring the guest voice of Leonard Nimoy

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Adam is thrilled when William Penn institutes a new open lunch policy, but Beverly has other plans. Geoff gets more than he bargained for when he uses Barrys student ID

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Geoff vows to rekindle Ericas interest in music, so she auditions for a college singing group. Beverly forces Adam and Murray to go camping together, hoping it will help them bond

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: When Adams birthday arrives, Beverly takes drastic measures to keep him from growing up too fast. Erica begins working at Murrays furniture store to pay off her parking tickets

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay revisits some of the restaurants that he set out to save, including the Mixing Bowl, the Olde Stone Mill, Peters and Campania. Have their owners pulled themselves out of their nightmares?

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: 999 Rescue Squad
programme.desc: The Hazardous Area Response Team is called to help defuse a bomb found in Wakefield, and to rescue a BMX rider who fell and fractured his spine in woods near Leeds

programme.title: 999 Rescue Squad
programme.desc: A suspected acid attack on the streets of Bradford leads to a busy shift for the crew. Documentary following the work of Yorkshire Ambulance Services Hazardous Area Response Team

programme.title: 999 Rescue Squad
programme.desc: The response team race to the rescue of a worker trapped in a collapsed trench, and paramedic Kim must risk her own life to give him medical treatment 10ft underground

programme.title: 999 Rescue Squad
programme.desc: A truck driver is trapped in his crushed cab after a motorway smash, while in Hull, firefighters handcuff a man to the rails of the Humber Bridge to stop him from jumping

programme.title: 999 Rescue Squad
programme.desc: A woman fights for her life after being knifed by her former partner, while a teenager on her way to seeing two YouTube stars in a live appearance is felled by a falling tree

programme.title: 999 Rescue Squad
programme.desc: Paramedic Kim climbs into a crushed car balanced over a fast-flowing river, while services across the Pennines are paralysed when a man plunges from a bridge onto a busy rail line

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: David Attenborough examines creatures that spin and weave, contemplating the history of silk production and its romantic origins in China

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: David Attenborough reveals why male seahorses give birth, and looks at how hyena packs are dominated by the female members

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: David Attenborough explores natures evolutionary anomalies and examines creatures whose stretched features have given them an edge in the natural world

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: David Attenborough examines how fleas are able to jump great distances for their size and attempts to discover how fast a cheetah can run

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: David Attenborough explores animals that have developed tool-making skills to help them survive, including orangutans and crows

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: David Attenborough examines animals that are able to expand their bodies, including anacondas and camels

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: David Attenborough reveals the unusual ways in which flamingos and blue whales eat, examining the ways feeding patterns have influenced both species behaviour in similar ways

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: The surprising preventive and curative medicine developed by certain species, including the hippopotamus, which secretes a red slime to act as a highly efficient sun screen

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: Two families with remarkable powers of regenerating unusually large body parts easily - salamanders, which do so when a large chunk, such as the tail or a limb, has been bitten off by a predator, and male moose, which grow and shed antlers every year

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: The naturalist continues to explore the secrets behind evolution, this time focusing on the animal kingdoms bizarre hybrids, including the pizzly bear, a cross between a polar bear and a grizzly, which is thought to have come into being as a result of global warming. He also covers the killer bee brought into existence due to the transfer of African bees to South America

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: Footage of animals that have unusual means of finding their way around. Dung beetles are able to navigate by the sky, using the position of the sun, moon and stars to determine which is the right direction to go in, while pigeons display remarkable powers of memory, able to recall complex travel routes and follow manmade roads and hedgerows

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: The naturalist explores the extremes of birth in the animal kingdom, explaining why the giant panda gives birth to the smallest babies of any existing mammal. He also looks at the kiwi, asking why the bird produces a single egg that is a quarter of its body mass - one of the largest in the world - and almost too big to lay

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Anthony Bourdain and his crew take their long-awaited first trip to Iran, sampling Dizi, Fesenjan, Biryani, and Tahdig

programme.title: The Sound Barrier
programme.desc: An aircraft manufacturer risks alienating his friends and family in a single-minded attempt to prove planes can exceed the speed of sound. David Leans drama, written by Terence Rattigan and starring Ralph Richardson, Ann Todd, Nigel Patrick, Dinah Sheridan and Denholm Elliott

programme.title: Against the Wind
programme.desc: A Belgian priest living in exile in Britain during the Second World War becomes a secret agent for the Allies, but his first mission is a disaster, leading to the capture of a resistance leader. Four soldiers are sent into occupied France to rescue the insurgent, but begin to realise they have a traitor in their midst. Thriller, starring Jack Warner and Simone Signoret

programme.title: The Mouse That Roared
programme.desc: The leaders of the tiny European duchy of Grand Fenwick decide to solve their bankruptcy problem by declaring war on the USA. They confidently expect to lose and thereby qualify for economic aid - but the plan takes an unexpected turn for the worse when the Americans surrender. Comedy, starring Peter Sellers in three roles, with Jean Seberg, William Hartnell, David Kossoff and Leo McKern

programme.title: The Fallen Idol
programme.desc: An ambassadors son idolises his fathers butler, and tries to throw the police off his scent when he is suspected of murder. However, the boys actions only make the servant seem more suspicious, and he begins to realise that his hero may have deceived him. Crime drama, starring Ralph Richardson and Bobby Henrey

programme.title: The Personal History of David Copperfield Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Armando Iannucci and actor Dev Patel, who stars in the title role, talk about bringing Charles Dickens beloved novel to the screen

programme.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: An alien arrives on Earth, accompanied by an awesomely powerful robot, on a fateful mission - to decide if the human race deserves to continue - and if not, to wipe it out. The visitor is imprisoned in a military facility, but a scientist helps him escape, hoping to prove that mankind is worth saving. Sci-fi drama remake, starring Keanu Reeves and Jennifer Connelly

programme.title: Free Guy
programme.desc: Guy lives a fairly monotonous life as a bank employee. That is until he meets the girl of his dreams and realises hes an NPC within a massive open world video game. Does he deviate from the life hes always lived or does he follow his dream girl into the unknown future? Adventure comedy, starring Ryan Reynolds, Jodie Comer, Taika Waititi and Lil Rel Howery

programme.title: Overlord
programme.desc: In 1944, a group of American soldiers land in an occupied French hamlet after their plane is destroyed by enemy fire. Their mission is to take out a heavily fortified Nazi radio tower hours before D-Day. However, they stumble across a mysterious Nazi lab where their bloodthirsty enemies are waiting for them. Action thriller from producer JJ Abrams, starring Jovan Adepo, Wyatt Russell and Mathilde Ollivier

programme.title: Flag Day
programme.desc: A man lives a double life as a counterfeiter, bank robber and con-man to provide for his daughter. Crime drama based on the true story of Jennifer Vogel. Directed by and starring Sean Penn, with his daughter Dylan playing the role of Jennifer. Also starring Josh Brolin, Regina King and Eddie Marsan

programme.title: Hue and Cry
programme.desc: A schoolboy in post-war London stumbles on a criminal conspiracy whose members use his favourite comic strip to secretly send information to each other about their illegal activities. The police do not take him seriously, so he enlists his friends to help stop the crooks. Ealing comedy, starring Alastair Sim, Harry Fowler, Jack Warner and Valerie White

programme.title: The Personal History of David Copperfield Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Armando Iannucci and actor Dev Patel, who stars in the title role, talk about bringing Charles Dickens beloved novel to the screen

programme.title: Ferdinand
programme.desc: After a bull with a big heart is mistaken for a dangerous beast, he is captured and torn from his home. Determined to return to his family, he rallies a misfit team on the ultimate adventure. Animated comedy, with the voices of John Cena, Kate McKinnon and Bobby Cannavale

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: A kindly farmer wins a cute piglet, which some greedy humans and jealous animals hope will end up as the Christmas roast. Undaunted, the young pig proves himself useful on the farm and enlists the aid of the resident dog in learning how to herd sheep. Family comedy, starring James Cromwell and Magda Szubanski, with Christine Cavanaugh, Miriam Margolyes and Hugo Weaving among those providing the voices of the animal characters

programme.title: Babe: Pig in the City
programme.desc: The pig and his farmyard pals take a trip to the big city, where their curiosity and love of adventure lands them in trouble, leaving the courageous Babe to find a way to save his chums from danger. Family comedy sequel, starring Magda Szubanski, Mickey Rooney and James Cromwell, and featuring the voice of Elizabeth Daily as Babe

programme.title: The Electrical Life of Louis Wain: Interview Special
programme.desc: Stars Benedict Cumberbatch and Claire Foy talk about making director Will Sharpes eccentric biopic of artist and inventor Louis Wain

programme.title: Charlies Angels
programme.desc: Whistleblower Elena Houghlin has evidence that the Calisto energy conservation project can be hacked for nefarious means. Former MI6 agent Jane Kano and heiress jailbird Sabina Wilson intervene to save Elena from an assassin and attempt to steal the remaining Calisto devices before they can be weaponised. Comedy thriller inspired by the TV series, starring Kristen Stewart, Ella Balinska, Naomi Scott and Elizabeth Banks, who also wrote and directed

programme.title: The Lost City
programme.desc: Reclusive author Loretta Sage writes about exotic places in her popular adventure novels that feature a handsome cover model named Alan. While on tour promoting her new book with Alan, Loretta gets kidnapped by an eccentric billionaire who hopes she can lead him to an ancient citys lost treasure from her latest story. Determined to prove he can be a hero in real life and not just on the pages of her books, Alan sets off to rescue her. Adventure comedy, starring Sandra Bullock, Channing Tatum and Daniel Radcliffe

programme.title: The Shape of Water
programme.desc: Elisa Esposito is a mute singleton who lives above a cinema. Although friends with Giles, a neighbouring artist, she lives a lonely existence. While he has designs on the cafe worker nearby, Elisa cleans up at top-secret government lab, a bus ride away in Baltimore, Maryland. One day in 1962, she makes a life-changing discovery when Elisa finds an amphibious humanoid creature who is being held captive, and they embark on an extraordinary relationship. Guillermo del Toros Oscar and Bafta-winning fantasy, starring Sally Hawkins, Michael Shannon, Octavia Spencer and Doug Jones

programme.title: Werewolves Within
programme.desc: A proposed gas pipeline divides the small town of Beaverfield. The day its residents meet at the local inn, a severe snowstorm batters the area, trapping everyone inside the establishment. As tensions between the opposing sides heighten, it is up to forest ranger Finn and postal worker Cecily to keep the peace and find out the person responsible for the appearance of a mysterious creature that is terrorising the community. Horror comedy, starring Sam Richardson and Milana Vayntrub

programme.title: Good News on GREAT!

programme.desc: Violet and Sean hit the town, Vera makes the most of Mollys Jack-tracking device and Ken pours out his woes to Emily.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Ken tries to make amends with Deirdre - but she responds by threatening to walk out. Paul has disappeared after a huge argument with Carla.

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Louisa faces off with love rival Carrie in a battle for Martins affections, and romance is in the air for Aunt Joan, who gains an admirer in the form of Edward. Elsewhere, Al makes a surprise reappearance and PC Penhale celebrates his birthday. Martin Clunes stars, with Joe Absolom and Louise Delamere

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: The irascible medic and Louisa embark on what seems to be a perfect first date at a classical music performance in the grounds of a country house, but an inappropriate remark from the doctor kills off any chance of romance. Elsewhere, Al worries that Paulines gambling is getting out of hand when he finds out that her moped has been repossessed. Comedy drama, starring Martin Clunes and Caroline Catz

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: The staff are excited by the arrival of a TV film crew at the hospital, especially Mr Harper, who is desperate to be caught on camera - and it looks like his dreams of stardom may be about to come true when Mr Middleditch gives him an important job for the broadcast. Elsewhere, the atmosphere is much more tense, as Dr Ormerod and nurse Meryl Taylor are called out to help a boy who has been trapped below the surface of an icy lake for 20 minutes - and to make matters worse, the ambulance carrying the unconscious lad back to hospital gets caught in a snowdrift. On a lighter note, Ray Piper is brought in with a huge bump on his head - and theres much hilarity when it turns out his wife has hit him with a frozen turkey. But before the day is out, hes not the only member of his family to be admitted. Festive special of the hospital drama, guest starring DJ Simon Bates as TV presenter Lennie Lamarr, with Robert Daws, Wendy Craig and Anna Madeley

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: The Aidensfield bobbies investigate a series of arson attacks, but have trouble finding the evidence to convict their chief suspects _ until a further blaze claims a victim. Elsewhere, Maggie receives shocking news, and Greengrass fancies himself as the villages answer to Billy Butlin, opening a disused railway carriage as a holiday home. Guest starring Ralf Little and Coronation Streets Alan Halsall (Tyrone Dobbs)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: An eccentric elderly lady reports an abduction, presenting the Aidensfield coppers with a fresh mystery to solve, while Greengrass has dealings with an old crony who wants him to enter a champion ferret in a race. Rural drama, starring Bill Maynard, Derek Fowlds and Margery Mason

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Barraclough ends her affair with Carl, prompting him to drunkenly confess to his brothers. Diane arranges work for Victoria, while Terry grows increasingly annoyed by Duke.

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Carl realises Jimmy has taken him abroad, while Matthew issues a threat to Barraclough. Val catches Victoria with her cigarettes and Terry tells Duke to stay away from TJ.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Ken pays a visit to old flame Denise and tells her he wants to meet his son Daniel. Whether the straight-talking hairdresser will agree is a different matter.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Leanne finally agrees to go out for a drink with Liam after shes finished seeing her new client. However, shes in for a big shock when she meets the punter in question.

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: News of Martin and Louisas engagement spreads rapidly through the village, and Aunt Joan is annoyed to hear about it from Dave rather than her nephew. Al steps in to help as Bert struggles to keep the restaurant afloat, while the doctor is puzzled when he learns Beths knee replacement wound is failing to respond to the medication he prescribed. Comedy drama series, starring Martin Clunes

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: The doctor and Louisa make plans for their wedding, but the big day runs far from smoothly, as a drunken vicar leaves Martin with a dilemma. Meanwhile, the restaurant where the reception is to be held is flooded and Isobel goes into labour. Comedy drama, starring Martin Clunes and Caroline Catz

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Gina tries to kick-start her singing career by performing at a local nightclub, only to find herself accused of possessing drugs - which she suspects were planted in her handbag. Elsewhere, David responds to an unexpected windfall by making a very bad investment. Rural drama, starring Tricia Penrose and David Lonsdale

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Having dabbled in just about everything else under the sun, Greengrass develops a sudden interest in archaeology, convinced Aidensfield is full of buried treasures just waiting to be discovered. Unfortunately for him, the first items unearthed prove to be human remains, leading to fears that there is a murderer at large. Rural drama, starring Bill Maynard and Jason Durr

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A land dispute escalates during a cowboy fair run by the Wild West Society in the village of Ford Florey. Farmers Jack Fincher and Silas Burbage both claim to own a patch of wasteland known as the Swamp, but Dan Malko wants to buy it and create a travellers site. Barnaby and Jones are called in when the feud leads to murder during the Wild West-style shoot-outs at the annual event. Guest starring Kenneth Cranham, with John Nettles and Jason Hughes

programme.title: Law and Order: UK
programme.desc: A police lab technician is stabbed to death in her home and while Brooks and Casey pursue their lead suspect, another woman is attacked in an identical fashion. The second victim survives and is able to identify her assailant, but she and Casey fall for each other - a relationship that threatens to damage both the CPSs case and the detectives career. Guest starring Lydia Leonard, with Bradley Walsh and Paul Nicholls

programme.title: Law and Order: UK
programme.desc: Georgia Taylor (Coronation Street, Casualty) and Paterson Joseph (Peep Show) join the cast as the crime drama returns for its seventh series. In the first of a two-part story, a suicidal man causes a train crash when he drives onto a railway crossing, killing 15 people. With Jake prosecuting, the mans defence barrister tries to prove his vulnerability and mental illness, but then a twist in the investigation leaves Sams career hanging in the balance. Starring Bradley Walsh, Dominic Rowan and Paul Nicholls

programme.sub-title: The Happiest Days of Your Life - Part One
